title: Vayne needs a buff
body:
Holy shit u crying kids need to git gud if u get one shotted u should have dodgd her q andmake her 0/40 by 2 minutes but u cant becoz ur tarsh

also it'z okay for a champino to deal 2k damage on one auto. She has no playrate in worlds so she sucks. RIto pls revert vayne nerfs and buff her, her Q should also grant attack speed and her w during ult should proc everi auto, thxs

replies.body: tfw people are so fed into hating vayne they can't tell if op is trolling or actually retarded
Thanks we need to buff vayne
